Auditoría de Usuarios

# First Last Handle Acciones
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SpinnerService } from 'src/app/core/spinner/spinner.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-actividades', templateUrl: './actividades.component.html', styleUrls: ['./actividades.component.css'] }) export class ActividadesComponent implements OnInit { spinner: boolean = true; constructor( private _spinnerService: SpinnerService ) { } ngOnInit() { this._spinnerService.spinner$.emit(this.spinner); this.getSpinner(); this.getActividades(); } getSpinner() { this._spinnerService.spinner$.subscribe(data => { this.spinner = data; }) } getActividades() { // tiempo para ver loading setTimeout(() => { this._spinnerService.spinner$.emit(false); }, 1000); } }
